title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Exploring Physics Motion Concepts Through Case-Based Collaborative Learning Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary physics terminology and mathematical calculation skills (understanding of velocity, time, and distance concepts)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can express the relationships between velocity, acceleration, force, and mass as mathematical formulas by analyzing real-world cases.
In a collaborative learning environment, learners can visualize and explain physical phenomena using VR simulations.
Through project-based assessment, learners can develop educational plans that apply physics concepts to real-life problems (e.g., travel route design).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
